application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x London Plane - Reduce height by 2m, Reduce spread by 1.5m maintaining a balanced shape as shown in annotated photograph, (Remove major dead wood), Lift low branches over communal bin shed leaving a 3m gap. Standing in group G1 of Tree Preservation Order; 2 x Lime - Reduce height by 1.5m (back to previous points leaving growth points on each branch), Reduce spread by 1.5m, as shown on annotated phtographs, (Remove major dead wood). T4 and standing in group G2 of Tree Preservation Order; 1 x Oak - Reduce height by 2m, Reduce spread by 1.5m retaining a natural shape, (Remove major deadwood). T2 of Tree Preservation Order; 1 x Copper Beech - Reduce height by 2m, Reduce spread by 1.5m keeping natural shape cutting branches no bigger than 25mm in diameter, (Remove major dead wood). T3 of Tree Preservation Order
